1506270.name: SRPG Studio Magic Effects Collection
1506270.description:
This DLC contains the following files (640x480 and 320x240).

1. Brave Power
2. Burst Hurricane
3. Cold Storm
4. Dark Circle
5. Double Thunder
6. Electric Shock
7. Evil Pressure
8. Heat Cannon
9. Meteor Fall
10. Tidal Wave

*How to Use*

1. Launch SRPG Studio. In the upper left corner of the application, there is a File menu. Open the DLC in the menu, and select "SRPG Studio Magic Effects Collection".

2. Go to the "SRPG Studio Magic Effects Collection" folder created on your desktop. Drag "Brave Power.sani" to "Tidal Wave.sani" in Windows Explorer and drop them into SRPG Studio.

3. If the drop is successful, a dialog box will appear asking if you want to import the sani file. Select OK here.
After this, go to the "Animations" dialog and open "Original Effects". You will see the imported sani file.

4. Go to "Database" in the root screen and open the "Weapos" tab. Then click on the icon. If you select "Mage" under "Type", "Select Animation" will appear, select "Brave Power" or something similar.
